ai.desc: The wizard gets buffed and the warrior gets nerfed. So it goes.

It is believed that at least one "unwinnable seed" consists of a floor 1 Jaw Worm dealing a total of 12 unblocked damage to a solo Ironclad. This would require astronomically bad luck with Neow bonuses, dice rolls, and shuffle order. NL NL Perhaps you have seen it already.
Only time will tell if we encounter its siblings Ardbeg and Laphroaig in StS 2.
